gobblin.aws

Class GobblinAWSClusterManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • gobblin.cluster.GobblinClusterManager
      • gobblin.aws.GobblinAWSClusterManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ApplicationLauncher, Closeable, AutoCloseable

    @Alpha
public class GobblinAWSClusterManager
extends GobblinClusterManager
    The AWS Cluster master class for Gobblin.

    This class makes use of super class GobblinClusterManager to run: 1. GobblinHelixJobScheduler for scheduling and running Gobblin jobs. 2. HelixManager to work with Helix and act as Helix controller. 3. JobConfigurationManager to discover new job configurations and updates to existing job configurations. More AWS specific services can be added in future to this class that are required to be run on Gobblin cluster master.

    Note: Shutdown initiated by GobblinAWSClusterLauncher via a Helix message of subtype HelixMessageSubTypes.APPLICATION_MASTER_SHUTDOWN is handled by super class GobblinClusterManager
